storyInfo: The group escapes Scáthanna Fields. On the eve of their new lives, they light up a bonfire, ready to say their goodbyes.

attributes.content: Reed, how's it goin' over there?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Yes, no problem.
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: Huff—Alright! That's the last tent we've got to put up.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Wow, you two are a powerful pair.
attributes.name: Taran Refugee

attributes.content: Right, you were taking off, weren't you?
attributes.name: Taran Refugee

attributes.content: Aye, Chenchen and I are investigatin' those 'spectres' that were under Arts control. We've still got other assignments once everythin's done here.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: This is the edge of County Trent. No barracks'll be comin' lookin' for trouble no more.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: *sigh*... If only we'd been better at maintaining order. Wouldn't have had all this commotion and unjust treatment.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Huh? What are you on about? If it weren't for all of you, there's no chance we would've made it this far.
attributes.name: Taran Refugee

attributes.content: If this were me own home, I'd be treating all of you to a nip of elderflower liqueur tonight. I'd even be giving the stuff away.
attributes.name: Taran Refugee

attributes.content: But most of the supplies we have on hand come from that... 'Rhodes Island' you lot're from, haha.
attributes.name: Taran Refugee

attributes.content: If we write to Rhodes Island, will you get the message? We'll be letting you know once we're settled somewhere. If you're ever back in the area, drop by and say hi.
attributes.name: Taran Refugee

attributes.content: Eh, maybe? Once Victoria's war comes to an end, plus there's someone Chenchen should be meeting...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: What about you, Reed? Where are you goin' next?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I... I think I'll make sure everyone has settled down, before I take care of my own business.
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: Even though they are away from the Scáthanna Fields, their crimes, and the hand of the lights-out bell... the Tarans still live in muddied lands, trapped where they stand.
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: I think... I need to help them come up with ideas.
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: I can speak both Taran and Victorian. If we enter the cities later on, we'll run into people of all kinds, and I can help negotiate... At least, I could do it more easily than others.
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: Oh, right, when you went lookin' for the Rhodes Island safehouse today, did you get followed by anyone?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I don't think so...
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: It's okay. Thank you for reminding me. If those soldiers are here for me... I won't be afraid.
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: And also... thank you for your kindness.
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: Say, will you sell me a tent when the time comes?
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: The factories in the cities make that canvas. They don't leak water even when they get rained on for half a month. Just perfect for me to retrofit my trolley with.
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: She's a fair kind-hearted one, and I'm sure you'll be fair when it comes to naming the price. I think you two'd have no trouble reaching a deal.
attributes.name: Moran

attributes.content: Haha, I'm joking. Where would I find the money for something this nice?
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: Who would've thought, though? We were just trying to figure out how to survive a couple days ago, but now we get to sleep in these sturdy old factory-made tents. We can even light fires at night.
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: Aye. They're a capable bunch.
attributes.name: Moran

attributes.content: And they know Oripathy well.
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: (Whistles)
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: (Incoherently rhythmic whistles)
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: O, mists that shroud the valley... ♪
attributes.name: Moran

attributes.content: ...Hide her figure waying far... ♪
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: It's a beautiful song, that.
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: Out of all the people who've fancied me... you might be the only one who still remembers me.
attributes.name: Moran

attributes.content: Don't be saying that now... I'm certain everyone remembers.
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: This Oripathy's not your fault.
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: (Whistles slightly off-key)
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: *sigh*.
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: That lad, Selmon's brother, he's gone. That whole Dublinn squad we helped out, they might just be gone, too.
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: We did all that for nothing.
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: At least... you're still alive. You went missing for so long, but you're still alive.
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: I saw Reed handing you some medicine. Is Oripathy really curable, then?
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: No, they said there's no cure for it.
attributes.name: Moran

attributes.content: But please don't be blaming those Dublinn soldiers. I hid them in the factory's lorries, and raw Originium ore shards got in their wounds... This isn't their fault.
attributes.name: Moran

attributes.content: I'm not blaming. I'm just feeling awful.
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: The rest of you had faith in Dublinn, but I didn't have what it takes. Dublinn's more impressive than any of us. They've got weapons, too. But we all saw what happened to that squad in the end.
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: Dublinn treats us well and lets our Taran voices be heard, but after that? It beats me... All I remember is the blood I saw on the lorries that day.
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: Even now, Selmon still wants to find Dublinn to fight the Victorians, and I can't pull her out of it.
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: She and Reed were chatting for so long that day, say. Did Reed not talk even a little sense into her?
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: I don't think it's bad that Selmon wants to do this. A colleen like her's got much to accomplish for other Tarans.
attributes.name: Moran

attributes.content: Do you remember? Not long after I got infected myself, the entire Infected district was chased out of town.
attributes.name: Moran

attributes.content: It was the stronger of us, after that, that took everything they could lay their hands on from the rest of us exiles. Left behind only frail pensioners and children, and the ones like me ailing badly from the sickness.
attributes.name: Moran

attributes.content: You should've told us sooner rather than keep it all to yourself. At the very least, it would've spared you some pain.
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: To tell the truth, I can hardly remember any of it. I can't remember why no one fought back, why no one tried to protect one another.
attributes.name: Moran

attributes.content: I always used to think that was just how life was. Doesn't matter what's in your hands when you're starving, you close your eyes and tuck in.
attributes.name: Moran

attributes.content: Lisa died at the bottom of the mine. So did Clodagh. Has your family ever complained about working the mines?
attributes.name: Moran

attributes.content: Er... I couldn't say, really—maybe it's how hard it is to blame someone for it. But at the very least, I did feel... right terrible when my sisters died.
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: I wanted to find someone to talk to about it, but it was dark and suffocating at the bottom of those mines, and no one had the time to listen. I got out to peddle my wares around, and it turned out everyone had their own troubles already. No one had an ear to lend to me.
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: But hey, not too late to talk now.
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: Right you are. It's not too late now.
attributes.name: Moran

attributes.content: The wood we've gathered should be enough to last us through the night.
attributes.name: Moran

attributes.content: (Whistles) ...Let's go, then. Won't be so easy for you to tell the way once the sun comes down.
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: Hey, the pot's bubbling. Can I have a bite now?
attributes.name: Taran Refugee

attributes.content: Settle down there, you cottonhead! Did you not ever cook supper back home?
attributes.name: Selmon

attributes.content: Wait inside the tent. Once the meat's done, give me a hand bringing it over.
attributes.name: Selmon

attributes.content: She seems to be in a better mood.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Yes... but I'm sure she's still grieving.
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: It's a good thing you killed her heart for Dublinn, at the very least.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: ...You knew?
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: And I imagine with you here, they won't stray onto the wrong path.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Though it'll be hard for you to keep walking with them, Draco.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I'm not wrong when it comes to these things.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Don't be daft, Fergal, you played King Gaeil's warrior in last year's play. Three times you fell with 'mortal wounds', three times you had to clamber back up. Your arms and legs were all bruised by the end.
attributes.name: Taran Refugee

attributes.content: Then I'll make him invincible this year. Every year, King Gaeil loses in battle, Gastrell dies at the bottom of the castle. Other than the costumes, we never try anything new.
attributes.name: Taran Refugee

attributes.content: Hey, Selmon, c'mere. Have a seat. I've been thinking you could take on the role of King Gaeil's left-hand man, the general, this year. Yeah, you're a bit young, but there's not one of us with more fire in their belly than you.
attributes.name: Taran Refugee

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Selmon

attributes.content: You're only saying that 'cause you saw the pot she's bringing over. Look, she doesn't want to.
attributes.name: Taran Refugee

attributes.content: No, what are you talking about? I don't know who that is.
attributes.name: Selmon

attributes.content: Eh? Don't they put on those plays every summer over by yours? We're trying to sort out who'll be playing which role.
attributes.name: Taran Refugee

attributes.content: Mmm... is that where someone calls herself the goddess of the river and splashes the audience at the end? That whole thing?
attributes.name: Selmon

attributes.content: I've seen it... but I'm not interested. Not unless I'm playing her.
attributes.name: Selmon

attributes.content: That's her mourning the dead soldiers. Her lines are harder to remember than any other role.
attributes.name: Taran Refugee

attributes.content: Oh.
attributes.name: Selmon

attributes.content: We might not finish building the theater before the end of the summer, though. You could have till next year to prepare.
attributes.name: Taran Refugee

attributes.content: Right... who knows.
attributes.name: Selmon

attributes.content: Looks like you still want to go after Dublinn?
attributes.name: Taran Refugee

attributes.content: Of course. You think I'm just going to give up like the rest of you?
attributes.name: Selmon

attributes.content: I made my decision after talking to Reed that day.
attributes.name: Selmon

attributes.content: I still believe it. Dublinn's dream can be realized, and someone has to realize it.
attributes.name: Selmon

attributes.content: ...What is it you want to find out from me?
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: I have nothing to ask. I've seen what you've done for myself.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I trust the judgments I make seeing what I do, and I trust Rhodes Island's judgment.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: But right now, in the eyes of most Victorians, there is only one Draco still alive.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Dublinn's Red Dragon, the descendant of the Taran king. More than enough to fill the dukes with their sinister ambitions and the nobles with anxiety.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: It must be difficult for you.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Does... she know my identity, then?
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: Bagpipe?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: She is actually very smart, and attentive, but there's a great deal she doesn't like to think negatively about—especially not friends she approves of.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: If we continue our journey together, that's something that both you and her will have to face eventually.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Are you... advising me to leave as soon as I can?
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: What's done can't be undone. You can't run from the responsibilities you have to bear.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: But I think that, to some people, whether you are a Draco or not doesn't actually matter so much.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: By tender stream that brushes on and through the upland grass ♪
attributes.name: Hoarse Singing

attributes.content: We make a toast to those of us not here to raise their glass ♪
attributes.name: Hoarse Singing

attributes.content: Someone's singing.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: ...It's probably Fergal.
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: Is this Taran?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Yes. It sounds like... it's about wine, and the uplands in summer. I've never heard it before... but it's beautiful.
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: Bid flap your wings to wake by light, wee fowl upon the bays ♪
Bear off the news we gather round, along and with the waves ♪
They're... all so happy.
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: I can tell.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: But all they have are their tents and fire.
attributes.name: Reed

attributes.content: Then I'm sure they'll be even happier when they have their houses and farmland.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Let's head inside.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Chenchen, you're finally back! Here, look at this! Mr. Odhrán can whistle with a blade of grass!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: (Whistles sharply)
attributes.name: Taran Refugee

attributes.content: Haha, my pitch can be pretty off. My da was really good at it, though. I picked up a bit here and there from him.
attributes.name: Taran Refugee

attributes.content: Hmm—hm-hmm—
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Oh, you don't mind if I sing along a little, do you?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Go ahead! It's our drinking song. Only thing I'll take offense to is an empty bottle, haha.
attributes.name: Taran Refugee

attributes.content: What's the lyrics, then? Is it okay if I sing in Victorian?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Hm... Let me fetch someone else. You just listen to them.
attributes.name: Taran Refugee

attributes.content: Fionn, you're up.
attributes.name: Taran Refugee

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: 'Ever does this land well with tears, yet we drink only of bygone dews and flames.'
By winding lane that blooms with rose and bellflow'r on the loam ♪
attributes.name: Selmon

attributes.content: You're out of tune! That's terrible!
attributes.name: Taran Refugee

attributes.content: Shut up! Not like you're any better!
attributes.name: Selmon

attributes.content: (Sharp whistle)
attributes.name: Taran Refugee

attributes.content: Ugh... I'm begging you, enough of that noise. You've got some bloody novel way of arguing...
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: Oi, no throwing stones either! What if we actually got hit here?
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: Wow, that bread smells good...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: You can have half!
attributes.name: Young Refugee

attributes.content: Oh, ta! Here, Chenchen, you have a bite. Come on, just one.
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Lush, isn't it? I wonder what herbs they're usin'...
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: Hmm... Can't tell.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Eh? You spent ages back in Yan. What, did your taste buds get more fussy, or just duller a bit?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: What do you think? We Lungmenites brew our tea in the summer with twenty-four kinds of medicinal herbs.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Really...? Oh, you're pullin' my leg again, aren't you?
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: I'm not.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: ...Are you enjoying yourself, Reed?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: This is how their lives could've been all along. A bit better than this too, of course.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You gave them their lives back.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Reed, you know Taran. No excuses from you. Sing!
attributes.name: Taran Refugee

attributes.content: (Teasing whistle) Sing.
attributes.name: Taran Refugee

attributes.text: Fare on and long, you traveler, but to where do you now roam? ♪

attributes.content: The transport will leave clear tracks in the mud. Should we take a detour?
attributes.name: Special Forces Soldier

attributes.content: No need. We'll head straight to our destination.
attributes.name: Fischer

attributes.content: Good stuff. And you, Moran.
attributes.name: Taran Refugee

attributes.content: Miss Moran, what're you doin' sittin' so far off? Reed's told you a million times it's okay!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: She's right. Come on, 'Wandering Bard of the Glen of Camai...' Sing.
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: O, mists that shroud the valley... hide her figure waying far... ♪
attributes.name: Moran

attributes.content: Well, gosh, I think I once heard this beautiful singing years ago.
attributes.name: Taran Refugee

attributes.content: I'm sure you have.
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: Right you are. I remember taking my sister around—she wasn't so sick that she couldn't walk yet. We were stood on the stone bridge, listening for a good while.
attributes.name: Taran Refugee

attributes.content: *sigh* There must be more bridges like that, right? With just how far the Camai flows.
attributes.name: Taran Refugee

attributes.text: Bid breezes past the rugged lime ♪

attributes.content: Bring the civilians under control first, but don't let any of them get hurt.
attributes.name: Fischer

attributes.content: Our target possesses excellent military accomplishments. Avoid direct confrontation to all possible extents.
attributes.name: Fischer

attributes.text: Pick me a flower for her ♪

attributes.content: Selmon, look. How's this for defensive posture? Learned it from you.
attributes.name: Taran Refugee

attributes.content: So? You'll just be chasing fowlbeasts from now on. What'd you learn that for?
attributes.name: Selmon

attributes.content: Do not talk to any of them. Not even a single word.
attributes.name: Fischer

attributes.content: Leave the rest to me.
attributes.name: Fischer

attributes.text: Bare bottles chill the bones with hurt ♪

attributes.content: Don't forget, we need to be out of here before daybreak.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.text: We make a toast to those of us not here to raise their glass ♪

attributes.content: Crossbows at the ready. Prepare smoke grenades.
attributes.name: Fischer

attributes.text: The tears we cup to drink are all the same and one, my lass ♪

attributes.content: *sigh*... I'm hopping out for some fresh air.
attributes.name: Fionn

attributes.content: Hm? Mist at this hour...?
attributes.name: Fionn
Fionn
attributes.content: You—

attributes.name: Fionn
attributes.content: Wh—

attributes.name: Fionn
attributes.content: When did you...
Good evening, sir.
attributes.name: Fischer
